duties_responsibilities.duty: Stay close to market trends and analyze key product trends in the marketplace.
Commercialize and interpret trends for the Reformation customer through trend-relevant and timeless dress designs.
Identify key silhouettes, fabrics, and trims relevant to the Reformation customer and sketch extensively new ideas and best-selling shapes.
Contribute to the concepting process to develop cohesive product stories that highlight trends and winning product strategies.
Lead the fits for woven dresses and work closely with the Product Development team to develop and introduce new, sustainable fabrications.
Anticipate future trends and seek out design and merchandising opportunities within the category. Maintain a high standard for quality and design.
Partner with Director of Design, Main Line to develop the vision and direction of the brand.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Fashion Design or a related field (Master's preferred)
